segments.text: Hello , Mike , long time no see . How's everything going ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not bad . Thank you . You look great today . And how is your husband ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He caught a cold yesterday , but he feels much better now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I'm glad to hear that . Please give my regards to him .
segments.speaker: S2
